## R Markdown



```{r column_creation}
Default_mod <- 
  Default %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  mutate(missclaf_cost = if_else(default == "No", balance*.15, balance))
Default_mod
```

```{r}
loss <- rep(NA, length(min(Default_mod$balance):max(Default_mod$balance)))
for (threshold in min(Default_mod$balance):max(Default_mod$balance)) {
  loss[threshold] <- Default_mod %>% 
    mutate(class = if_else(balance<threshold, "No", "Yes"),
           loss = if_else(class == default, 0, missclaf_cost)) %>%
    summarise(loss = sum(loss)) %>%
    pull(loss)
}
```
